string.name: app_name
string.comment: App name, please do not translate

string.name: cancel
string.comment: Cancel string, used all over the place

string.name: write_finished
string.comment: Notification title when the write operation is successful

string.name: success_notif_content_text
string.comment: Notification title when the write operation is successful. Parameters: filename, device name

string.name: write_failed
string.comment: Notification title when a non-recoverable error occurs

string.name: action_required
string.comment: Notification title when a recoverable error occurs

string.name: notif_channel_job_progress_desc
string.comment: Notification channel description for long-running job progress, shown in Android settings

resources.string: বর্তমান কাজের অগ্রগতি প্রদর্শনের জন্য ব্যবহৃত

string.name: notif_channel_job_progress_name
string.comment: Notification channel name for long-running job progress, shown in Android settings

string.name: notif_channel_job_result_desc
string.comment: Notification channel description for job outcome notifications, shown in Android settings

resources.string: একটি সম্পূর্ণ কাজের ফলাফল প্রদর্শনের জন্য ব্যবহৃত

string.name: notif_channel_job_result_name
string.comment: Notification channel name for job outcome notifications, shown in Android settings

string.name: notification_write_progress_title
string.comment: Notification title used for long-running job status

string.name: notification_verify_progress_title
string.comment: Notification title used for long-running job status

string.name: notification_write_no_notifications_text
string.comment: Notification content for long-running job status, used when the user has not granted the notification permission. The first parameter will be replaced with the source file name, the second one with the USB stick name

resources.string: অগ্রগতির জন্য নোটিফিকেশন সক্রিয় করুন • %1$s থেকে %2$s এ লেখা হচ্ছে

string.name: notification_write_tap_for_progress_text
string.comment: Notification content for long-running job status, used when the user has granted the notification permission but no progress info is available. The first parameter will be replaced with the source file name, the second one with the USB stick name

resources.string: অগ্রগতির জন্য ট্যাপ করুন • %1$s থেকে %2$s এ লেখা হচ্ছে

string.name: notification_write_progress_content
string.comment: Notification content: "{file name} to {device name}", used when the user has granted the notification permission; The notification title will be: "Writing image…" and this string will show up right below it.

string.name: notification_verify_progress_content
string.comment: Notification content: "{device name} against {file name}", used when the user has granted the notification permission; The notification title will be: "Verifying image…" and this string will show up right below it.

string.name: unknown_filename
string.comment: Placeholder file name

string.name: permission_denied_for_usb_device
string.comment: Displayed in a toast when the usb permission is denied

string.name: usb_device_was_unplugged
string.comment: Displayed in a toast when the USB device is unplugged

string.name: write_an_image
string.comment: Displayed in the home page main call-to-action button

string.name: whats_supported
string.comment: Displayed in the homepage; opens a page that lists all the supported devices and formats

string.name: style
string.comment: Title of the menu that allows selecting the app color scheme

string.name: device_setting
string.comment: Style menu option that selects the device default light/dark theme

string.name: light
string.comment: Style menu option that selects the light theme

string.name: dark
string.comment: Style menu option that selects the dark theme

string.name: dynamic_colors
string.comment: Style menu option that selects the Material You dynamic color scheme

string.name: about
string.comment: Menu option that opens the about page

string.name: is_this_a_windows_iso
string.comment: Dialog title; the dialog alerts the user that Windows images are not supported

string.name: a_regular_windows_iso_won_t_work
string.comment: Dialog message; the dialog alerts the user that Windows images are not supported

resources.string: EtchDroid-এর সাথে একটি সাধারণ Windows ISO কাজ করবে না, যদি না এটি EtchDroid, Etcher বা dd-এর জন্য বিশেষভাবে প্রস্তুত করা হয়।

string.name: continue_anyway
string.comment: Dialog button text: if the user clicks it, the app ignores the warning and continues

string.name: select_a_usb_drive
string.comment: Title of the dialog listing the available USB drives

string.name: connect_a_usb_drive
string.comment: Title of the dialog listing the available USB drives, when no USB drive is connected

string.name: confirm_operation
string.comment: Title of the page where the operation details are listed; the user can confirm or cancel the operation from here

string.name: image_to_write
string.comment: Label for the card that displays the details about the image that is about to be written

string.name: destination_usb_device
string.comment: Label for the card that displays the details about the USB drive that is about to be used

string.name: unknown_device
string.comment: Device name placeholder

string.name: grant_access
string.comment: Displayed on the button to request the permission to write to the USB drive. Keep it short.

string.name: be_careful
string.comment: Title of the card that alerts the user that, if they continue, all data on the USB drive will be lost

string.name: writing_the_image_will_erase
string.comment: Message displayed on the card that alerts the user that, if they continue, all data on the USB drive will be lost

resources.string: ইমেজ লেখার ফলে নির্বাচিত ড্রাইভের সমস্ত তথ্য মুছে যাবে

string.name: write_image
string.comment: Confirmation button; when pressed, the operation starts

string.name: lay_your_device_flat_no_accel
string.comment: Title of the dialog that forces the user to lay the device flat on a table before continuing, when the device has no gravity sensor

resources.string: চালিয়ে যাওয়ার আগে আপনার ডিভাইসটি টেবিলে সমানভাবে রাখুন।

string.name: continue_
string.comment: Button displayed in the dialog that forces the user to lay the device flat on a table before continuing, when the device has no gravity sensor; when pressed the operation starts.

string.name: lay_your_device_flat
string.comment: Title of the dialog that forces the user to lay the device flat on a table before continuing, when the device has a gravity sensor

resources.string: আপনার ডিভাইসটি টেবিলে সমানভাবে রাখুন এবং এটি স্পর্শ করবেন না

string.name: skip
string.comment: Button displayed in the dialog that forces the user to lay the device flat on a table before continuing, when the device has a gravity sensor; when pressed the flat check is skipped and the operation starts.

string.name: supported
string.comment: Description of a device or image type that is supported

string.name: maybe_supported
string.comment: Description of a device or image type that might be supported

string.name: not_supported
string.comment: Description of a device or image type that is not supported

string.name: supported_devices_and_images
string.comment: Title of the page that lists all the supported devices and images

string.name: devices
string.comment: Title of the section that lists all the supported device types

string.name: usb_flash_drives
string.comment: Device type

string.name: memory_cards_using_a_usb_adapter
string.comment: Device type

resources.string: মেমোরি কার্ড, ইউএসবি অ্যাডাপ্টার ব্যবহার করে

string.name: usb_hard_drives_ssds_some_might_work
string.comment: Device type

resources.string: ইউএসবি হার্ড ড্রাইভ / এসএসডি (কিছু কাজ করতে পারে)

string.name: usb_docks_and_hubs_might_have_power_issues
string.comment: Device type

resources.string: ইউএসবি ডক এবং হাব (এগুলিতে বিদ্যুৎ সমস্যা থাকতে পারে)

string.name: memory_cards_using_the_internal_slot
string.comment: Device type

resources.string: মেমোরি কার্ড, অভ্যন্তরীণ স্লট ব্যবহার করে

string.name: optical_disk_drives
string.comment: Device type

string.name: floppy_disk_drives
string.comment: Device type

string.name: any_thunderbolt_only_device
string.comment: Device type

string.name: disk_images
string.comment: Title of the section that lists all the supported image types

string.name: microsoft_windows_isos_any_version
string.comment: Image type

string.name: apple_dmg_disk_images
string.comment: Image type

string.name: arch_linux_ubuntu_debian_fedora_pop_os_linux_mint_freebsd_etc
string.comment: Image type

resources.string: আর্চ লিনাক্স, উবুন্টু, ডেবিয়ান, ফেডোরা, পপ!_ওএস, লিনাক্স মিন্ট, ফ্রিবিএসডি ইত্যাদি।

string.name: other_modern_gnu_linux_and_bsd_distributions_live_isos
string.comment: Image type

resources.string: অন্যান্য আধুনিক GNU/Linux এবং BSD ডিস্ট্রিবিউশনগুলির লাইভ আইএসও

string.name: raspberry_pi_sd_card_images_unzip_first
string.comment: Image type

resources.string: রাস্পবেরি পাই এসডি কার্ড ইমেজ (প্রথমে আনজিপ করুন!)

string.name: any_other_image_that_works_with_balena_etcher_or_dd
string.comment: Image type

resources.string: যেকোনো অন্যান্য ইমেজ যা Balena Etcher বা dd এর সাথে কাজ করে

string.name: older_gnu_linux_distributions_isos_2010
string.comment: Image type

string.name: support_for_dmg_images_was_removed
string.comment: At the end of the supported devices and images page we state that DMGs are no longer supported; the parameter is replaced with the word "GitHub"

resources.string: EtchDroid 2.0 এ DMG ইমেজের জন্য সমর্থন সরানো হয়েছে। পুরানো সংস্করণ %1$s থেকে ডাউনলোড করা যেতে পারে।

string.name: developed_by
string.comment: Displayed in the about page; parameters are: author name, the word "contributors" (translated separately), "GitHub"

resources.string: %1$s এবং অন্যান্য %2$s দ্বারা উন্নত।\nসোর্স কোড %3$s এ পাওয়া যায়।\nGNU GPLv3 লাইসেন্সের অধীনে লাইসেন্সকৃত।

string.name: contributors
string.comment: Part of the following sentence: "Developed by Author Name and other contributors"

string.name: website
string.comment: Displayed in the about page links; keep it very short!

string.name: support_the_project
string.comment: Displayed in the about page links; keep it short!

string.name: verifying_image
string.comment: Title of the progress page while an image is being verified

string.name: writing_image
string.comment: Title of the progress page while an image is being written

string.name: please_avoid_using_your_device
string.comment: Subtitle of the progress page while an image is being written

resources.string: অনুগ্রহ করে আপনার ডিভাইস ব্যবহার এড়িয়ে চলুন

string.name: would_you_like_to_be_notified
string.comment: Displayed in a card in the progress page; keep it concise, there's not much space

resources.string: সম্পন্ন হলে কি আপনাকে জানানো হবে? শুধুমাত্র অগ্রগতি আপডেট, কোন স্প্যাম বা বিজ্ঞাপন নেই।

string.name: no_thanks
string.comment: Button to reject receiving notifications

string.name: sure
string.comment: Button to accept receiving notifications

string.name: verifying
string.comment: As part of the sentence: "Verifying DeviceName against FileName.iso"; keep the same word order as English. Open an issue if it's not possible in your language.

string.name: copying
string.comment: As part of the sentence: "Copying FileName.iso to DeviceName"; keep the same word order as English. Open an issue if it's not possible in your language.

string.name: against
string.comment: As part of the sentence: "Verifying DeviceName against FileName.iso"; keep the same word order as English. Open an issue if it's not possible in your language.

string.name: to
string.comment: As part of the sentence: "Copying FileName.iso to DeviceName"; keep the same word order as English. Open an issue if it's not possible in your language.

string.name: getting_ready
string.comment: Displayed in the progress info indicator while no progress data is available

string.name: skip_verification
string.comment: Displayed on a button that, when pressed, skips the verification of the written image

string.name: image_written_successfully
string.comment: Title of the success page

string.name: write_a_review
string.comment: Displayed in a button on the success page

string.name: star_on_github
string.comment: Displayed in a button on the success page

string.name: got_an_unsupported_drive_notification
string.comment: Title of the card that teaches the user about any "Issues with this drive" notifications

string.name: it_s_safe_to_ignore
string.comment: Message of the card that teaches the user about any "Issues with this drive" notifications; the parameter will be replaced with the translation of "Learn what it means"

resources.string: এটি উপেক্ষা করাই নিরাপদ! শুধু আপনার ড্রাইভ আনপ্লাগ করুন এবং স্বাভাবিকভাবে ব্যবহার করুন। %1$s এবং কিভাবে আপনার ড্রাইভ পরে ফরম্যাট করতে হবে দেখুন।

string.name: learn_what_it_means
string.comment: Part of the message of the card that teaches the user about any "Issues with this drive" notifications; the full sentence is "Learn what it means and see how to format your drive later"

string.name: there_was_an_error
string.comment: Title of the non-recoverable error page

string.name: start_over
string.comment: Button in the error page that, when pressed, restarts the app

string.name: try_again
string.comment: Button in the error page that, when pressed, retries the write from scratch

string.name: i_did_not_unplug_it
string.comment: Title of the card that, when a USB disconnection is detected, teaches the user how it could have happened inadvertently

string.name: how_did_this_happen
string.comment: Title of the card that, when a recoverable error occurs, teaches the user why it could have happened

string.name: perhaps_your_usb_port_is_dirty
string.comment: Message of the card that, when a USB disconnection is detected, teaches the user how it could have happened inadvertently

resources.string: সম্ভবত আপনার ইউএসবি পোর্টটি ময়লা, আপনার অ্যাডাপ্টার ত্রুটিযুক্ত, অথবা আপনার ডিভাইস যথেষ্ট বিদ্যুৎ সরবরাহ করতে সক্ষম নয়। অন্য একটি অ্যাডাপ্টার বা ডিভাইস চেষ্টা করার কথা বিবেচনা করুন।

string.name: usb_drives_are_unreliable
string.comment: Message of the card that, when a recoverable error occurs, teaches the user why it could have happened

resources.string: ইউএসবি ড্রাইভগুলি নির্ভরযোগ্য নয়, এবং Android স্বয়ংক্রিয়ভাবে পুনরুদ্ধারের জন্য যথেষ্ট অনুমতি প্রদান করে না। আমাদের যা আছে তার সাথে চলতে হবে!

string.name: this_is_unexpected_it_s_probably_a_bug_please_report_it
string.comment: Message of the card about a recoverable unknown error

resources.string: এটি অপ্রত্যাশিত, সম্ভবত এটি একটি বাগ। অনুগ্রহ করে এটি রিপোর্ট করুন!

string.name: to_recover_unplug
string.comment: Text that explains what to do when a recoverable error has occurred

resources.string: পুনরুদ্ধার করতে, আপনার ইউএসবি ড্রাইভ আনপ্লাগ করুন, এটি আবার প্লাগ ইন করুন এবং এটি অ্যাক্সেস করার অনুমতি দিন।

string.name: representation_of_the_required_steps
string.comment: Textual description (for accessibility purposes) of the graphic that shows the required steps to recover from a recoverable error

resources.string: প্রয়োজনীয় ধাপগুলির উপস্থাপনা: আনপ্লাগ, পুনরায় সংযোগ, অনুমতি প্রদান

string.name: plug_in_the_same_usb
string.comment: Message displayed when a user tries to recover from a recoverable error but plugs in a different USB device

resources.string: আপনার আগে যে ইউএসবি ডিভাইসটি ব্যবহার করেছেন সেটিই প্লাগ ইন করুন!

string.name: usb_device_reconnected_resuming
string.comment: Message displayed in a toast when the write operation is successfully resumed

resources.string: ইউএসবি ডিভাইস পুনরায় সংযুক্ত করা হয়েছে, আবার শুরু হচ্ছে

string.name: the_device_is_not_responding
string.comment: Error message

string.name: missing_permission_to_access_the_usb_device
string.comment: Error message

resources.string: ইউএসবি ডিভাইসে অ্যাক্সেস করার অনুমতি নেই

string.name: the_image_is_is_larger_than_the_device
string.comment: Error message; parameters are the image file size and the device size

string.name: could_not_open_the_source_file
string.comment: Error message

string.name: an_unknown_error_occurred
string.comment: Error message; parameter is the underlying error message

string.name: the_usb_drive_was_unplugged
string.comment: Error message

string.name: the_usb_drive_stopped_responding
string.comment: Error message

string.name: the_usb_device_content_does_not_match_the_image
string.comment: Error message displayed when the verification failed

resources.string: ইউএসবি ডিভাইসের বিষয়বস্তু ইমেজটির সাথে মেলে না

string.name: write_another_image
string.comment: Displayed in the successful write page, when clicked the app goes back to the initial page

string.name: title_activity_confirm_operation
string.comment: Title of the screen that displays the summary of the operation about to be performed

string.name: no_image_uri_provided
string.comment: Error message (shown in a toast) when the operation confirmation screen is opened without a source file; the app redirects back to the home page

resources.string: কোনো ইমেজ URI প্রদান করা হয়নি

string.name: no_destination_device_selected
string.comment: Error message (shown in a toast) when the operation confirmation screen is opened without a destination device; the app redirects back to the home page

resources.string: কোনো গন্তব্য ডিভাইস নির্বাচন করা হয়নি

string.name: service_timeout_message
string.comment: Error message displayed when the background write service does not send any progress updates for a suspiciously long time. In this case, the app assumes the service got stuck and prompts the user to try again.

resources.string: লেখার প্রক্রিয়া আটকে গেছে বলে মনে হচ্ছে। অনুগ্রহ করে আবার চেষ্টা করুন।

string.name: community_windows_images
string.comment: "You're on your own" can be translated with something similar to "unsupported" or "be careful!" if it makes more sense in the target language

resources.string: EtchDroid-এর জন্য তৈরি কমিউনিটি-বিল্ট Windows ইমেজ (নিজের দায়িত্বে: এতে ভাইরাস থাকতে পারে!)

string.name: worker_null_device_error
string.comment: Error message displayed when users get a mysterious NullPointerException while starting a new write. The original translation tries to give the user a general idea of the issue without being too technical.

resources.string: একটি লেখার প্রচেষ্টা শুরু করা হয়েছিল কিন্তু দুর্ভাগ্যবশত কিছু তথ্য হারিয়ে গেছে। অনুগ্রহ করে আবার চেষ্টা করুন।

string.name: please_report_fatal_issue
string.comment: Displayed in the fatal error screen, prompting the users to report the issue on GitHub along with the steps to reproduce it

resources.string: যদি আপনি পারেন, এই ত্রুটি সম্পর্কে GitHub এ রিপোর্ট করুন এবং এর আগে যা ঘটেছিল তার পদক্ষেপগুলি অন্তর্ভুক্ত করুন।

string.name: view_github_issues
string.comment: Displayed in the fatal error screen, in a small button. When pressed, the app opens the GitHub issues page. Since the button is small, please keep this short. You can replace it with "GitHub issues" if "View GitHub issues" is too long in your language.

string.name: telemetry
string.comment: Displayed in the menu if the current app build may send telemetry (Google Play builds)

string.name: privacy_policy
string.comment: Displayed in the app menu, as well as in other links to the privacy policy

string.name: telemetry_rationale
string.comment: Displayed in builds with telemetry enabled (Google Play) when the user tries to opt-out of telemetry to try to convince them not to. '%1$s' is replaced with a link to the privacy policy; the `privacy_policy` string is used.

resources.string:
EtchDroid আপনার গোপনীয়তার মূল্য দেয় এবং শুধুমাত্র অ্যাপের সমস্যাগুলি তদন্ত করতে ন্যূনতম টেলিমেট্রি ব্যবহার করে।

আমাদের ওপেন-সোর্স কমিউনিটির অংশ হন—টেলিমেট্রি সক্রিয় রাখুন এবং EtchDroid উন্নত করতে সহায়তা করুন!

আমরা কোনো ব্যক্তিগত-সনাক্তযোগ্য তথ্য সংগ্রহ করি না, তবে আমরা স্বচ্ছতায় বিশ্বাস করি এবং আপনাকে জানাতে চাই যে ওপেন করা ইমেজ ফাইলের নাম এবং ইউএসবি ডিভাইস আইডি বেনামেই সংগ্রহ করা হয় যাতে নির্দিষ্ট হার্ডওয়্যার নিয়ে সমস্যার সমাধান করা যায়। যদি আপনার ইমেজ ফাইলের নাম বা ডিভাইস আইডি অত্যন্ত সংবেদনশীল না হয়, তবে এটি শেয়ার করা নিরাপদ। (%1$s)

string.name: we_need_your_help
string.comment: Title of the dialog that asks the user to enable telemetry

string.name: telemetry_icon
string.comment: Description of the telemetry icon for accessibility purposes

string.name: telemetry_opt_out
string.comment: Button to opt-out of telemetry; it can be translated as "Disable telemetry" if it fits better in the target language

string.name: telemetry_keep_enabled
string.comment: Button to opt-in to telemetry; it can be translated as "Enable telemetry" if it fits better in the target language

string.name: etchdroid_uses_telemetry
string.comment: Displayed in the main app screen on first launch in a toast/snackbar. It should be short and concise.

string.name: learn_more
string.comment: Displayed in the main app screen on first launch as a snackbar action button. It should be short and concise.

string.name: send_anonymous_data
string.comment: Displayed in the main app menu; controls whether the app sends anonymous telemetry info.
